DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate long-term efficacy safety two dosage bicifadine SR ( 600 mg/day 1200 mg/day ) 52 week reduce chronic peripheral neuropathy pain due diabetes adult outpatient .
DOC.brief_title: A 52-Week Study Bicifadine Patients With Chronic Neuropathic Pain Associated With Diabetic Peripheral Neuropathy
DOC.criteria: Male female 18 year old Diagnosis type 1 type 2 noninsulin dependent diabetes mellitus Chronic bilateral pain due diabetic neuropathy , pain least six month . Primary pain located foot . Subject participate complete XTL 07001 clinical trial . Contact site additional information . Symptoms painful condition Presence amputation toe Clinically significant psychiatric neuropsychological disorder Use certain medication Clinically important disease Pregnancy History alcohol narcotic abuse within two year . Contact site additional information .
